Package de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

TCG IM(C/V)Connection adapter.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionHandshakeRetryListener
    Generic listener for handshake retry requests from an IM(C/V) for a specific connection.
    ImcConnectionAdapter
    Generic IMC connection adapter adapting and controlling an IMC connection.
    ImcConnectionAdapterFactory
    Generic IMC connection adapter factory.
    ImcConnectionContext
    Generic IMC connection context.
    ImConnectionAdapter
    Generic IM(C/V) connection adapter base containing common connection attributes and functions to control a connection.
    ImConnectionContext
    Generic connection context base.
    ImvConnectionAdapter
    Generic IMV connection adapter adapting and controlling an IMV connection.
    ImvConnectionAdapterFactory
    Generic IMV connection adapter factory.
    ImvConnectionContext
    Generic IMV connection context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractImConnectionAdapter
    Generic base for an IM(C/V) connection adapter with connection control functions.
    AbstractImConnectionContext
    Generic base for an IM(C/V) connection context.
    ImcConnectionAdapterFactoryIetf
    The factory creates an IMC connection adapter according to IETF/TCG specifications.
    ImcConnectionAdapterIetf
    IMC connection adapter adapting a simple IMC connection according to IETF/TCG specifications.
    ImcConnectionAdapterIetfLong
    IMC connection adapter adapting an IMC connection according to IETF/TCG specifications, that supports long addressing.
    ImvConnectionAdapterFactoryIetf
    The factory creates an IMV connection adapter according to IETF/TCG specifications.
    ImvConnectionAdapterIetf
    IMV connection adapter adapting a simple IMV connection according to IETF/TCG specifications.
    ImvConnectionAdapterIetfLong
    IMV connection adapter adapting an IMV connection according to IETF/TCG specifications, that supports long addressing.
